title: World of Warcraft: Foreign Realm Domination - Novel Updates
tags: Army   Army Building   Bodyguards   Cunning Protagonist   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Enemies Become Lovers   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Management   Money Grubber   Orcs   Perverted Protagonist   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Angry Thrall   愤怒的萨尔
description: Xiao Yu, who was a student from modern Earth, accidentally transports to another world and becomes the lord of a territory. Facing an unfavorable situation, he vows to take back his family business, build his new territory, kill all of those who covet his wealth, and dominate the world!>
